	to the Company in respect of shares held by it.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	After the liquidation has been completed, the Company&#146;s books, records and other information carriers shall be kept for the period prescribed by law by the person designated for that purpose in the resolution of
	the general meeting to dissolve the Company. Where the general meeting has not designated such a person, the liquidators shall do so.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_3>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Dear Sir/Madam,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Registration
	with the US Securities and Exchange Commission of common shares in the capital of the Issuer
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	1. Introduction
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We have acted as counsel as to matters of Netherlands law to Merus B.V., a private company incorporated under the laws of the Netherlands having its registered
	office (
<I>
	statutaire zetel
</I>
	) in Utrecht, the Netherlands and its principal place of business at Padualaan 8, 3584 CH Utrecht, the Netherlands (the &#147;
<B>
	Issuer
</B>
	&#148;) in connection with the offering by the Issuer of up to 4,983,333 common
	shares with a nominal value of EUR 0.09&nbsp;per share (the &#147;
<B>
	Common Shares
</B>
	&#148;) pursuant to an underwriting agreement, to be entered into by the Issuer and the several underwriters named in Schedule I thereto (the
	&#147;
<B>
	Underwriters
</B>
	&#148;) (the &#147;
<B>
	Underwriting Agreement
</B>
	&#148;) and the Registration Statement on Form F-1 filed with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#147;
<B>
	Commission
</B>
	&#148;) on 19&nbsp;October 2015
	(Registration No.&nbsp;333-207490) (as so filed and as amended the &#147;
<B>
	Registration Statement
</B>
	&#148;). The term &#147;
<B>
	Offer Shares
</B>
	&#148; shall include the Common Shares and any additional common shares of the Company registered by the
	Company pursuant to Rule 462(b) under the Securities Act in connection with the offering contemplated by the Registration Statement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Certain terms used
	in this opinion letter and not defined above are defined in Annex 1 (
<I>
	Definitions
</I>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	2. Dutch Law
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This opinion letter is limited to Dutch law in effect on the date of this opinion letter. It (including all terms used in it) is to be construed in accordance
	with Dutch law.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3. Scope of Inquiry
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	For the purpose
	of this opinion letter, we have examined, and relied upon the accuracy of the factual statements and compliance with the undertakings in, the following documents:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A copy of the Registration Statement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.2
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A copy of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="27">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="27" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the Issuer&#146;s deed of incorporation and articles of association as provided by the Chamber of Commerce;
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	34172642. All our services are based on an engagement agreement with Eversheds B.V. and are subject to our general terms and conditions, including a limitation of liability. The general terms and conditions are available on our website:
	www.eversheds.nl/en/about/general_conditions/ and filed with the Chamber of Commerce in Amsterdam. A copy will be sent to you free of charge upon request. Attorney-trust account ING Bank NL14INGB0662764102. Notarial designated account Volders
	Goedvolk ING Bank NL84INGB0664375952.

	In addition, we have examined such documents, and performed such other investigations,
	as we considered necessary for the purpose of this opinion letter.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Our examination has been limited to the text of the documents mentioned in paragraph 3
	of this opinion letter.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	4. Assumptions
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	For the
	purpose of this opinion, we have made the following assumptions:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	4.1
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="27">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="27" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Each copy document conforms to the original and each original is genuine and complete.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="27">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="27" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Each signature is the genuine signature of the individual concerned.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="27" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Registration Statement has been or will have been filed with the SEC in the form referred to in this opinion letter.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="27" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Deed of Conversion will have been executed in the form referred to in this opinion letter.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="27" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Offer Shares will have been validly accepted by the subscriber for them.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	5. Opinion
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Based on the documents and investigations referred to and the assumptions made in paragraphs 3 and 4, we are of the following opinion:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	5.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	When issued pursuant to a validly signed Deed of
	Issuance and upon payment in accordance with that Deed of Issuance, the Offer Shares will have been validly issued and will be fully paid and nonassessable.
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	1
</SUP>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6. Reliance
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This opinion is an exhibit to the Registration Statement and may be relied upon for the purpose of the Registration. It may not be supplied, and its contents
	or existence may not be disclosed to any person other than as an Exhibit to (and therefore together with) the Registration Statement and may not be relied upon for any purpose other than the Registration.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.2
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Each person relying on this opinion agrees, in so
	relying, that only Eversheds B.V. shall have any liability in connection with this opinion letter, that this opinion letter and all liability and other matters relating to this opinion letter shall be governed exclusively by Dutch law and that the
	Dutch courts shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute relating to this opinion letter.
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:8.0PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;WIDTH:10%">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="27" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	1
</SUP>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	In this opinion, &#147;nonassessable&#148; &#150; which term has no equivalent in Dutch &#150; means, in relation to a share, that the issuer of the share has no right to require the holder of the share to pay to the
	issuer any amount (in addition to the amount required for the share to be fully paid) solely as a result of his shareholdership.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; HEIGHT:0PT; FONT-SIZE:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	6.3
</B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

<A NAME="eolPage340"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<DIV STYLE="POSITION:RELATIVE;FLOAT:LEFT; WIDTH:4%;PADDING-RIGHT:1%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;PADDING-TOP:3PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/05/09/0001193125-16-582683_G97787G04X79.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="POSITION:RELATIVE;FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; WIDTH:92%;PADDING-RIGHT:1%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;PADDING-TOP:3PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Annex 1 &#150; Definitions
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In this opinion:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Chamber of Commerce
</B>
	&#148; means
	the Chamber of Commerce (
<I>
	kamer van koophandel
</I>
	) of the place where the Issuer has its principal place of business.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Deed of
	Conversion
</B>
	&#148; means the draft deed of conversion and amendment of the articles of association whereby Merus B.V. will be converted to Merus N.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Deed of Issuance
</B>
	&#148; means a draft of the deed of issuance providing for the issue of the Offer Shares.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Dutch law
</B>
	&#148; means the law directly applicable in the Netherlands.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Excerpt
</B>
	&#148; means a trade register excerpt relating to the Issuer provided by the Chamber of Commerce and dated at the date of this opinion
	letter.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Management Board Resolution
</B>
	&#148; an electronic copy of the executed written resolution of the management board of the Issuer, dated
	6&nbsp;May 2016 evidencing,
<I>
	inter alia
</I>
	, its authorization of the Issuer to enter into the Underwriting Agreement and to execute the Deed of Issuance, (ii)&nbsp;to issue the Offer Shares and (iii)&nbsp;to exclude the pre-emptive rights in
	relation to the issue of the Offer Shares.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Registration
</B>
	&#148; means the registration of the Offer Shares with the SEC under the Securities
	Act.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	SEC
</B>
	&#148; means the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Securities Act
</B>
	&#148; means the U.S. Securities Act of 1933, as amended.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Shareholders Register
</B>
	&#148; means the Issuer&#146;s shareholders register.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Shareholders Resolution
</B>
	&#148; an electronic copy of the written resolution of the general meeting of the Issuer, dated 6&nbsp;May 2016
	evidencing,
<I>
	inter alia
</I>
	, the authorisation of the management board, subject to approval of the supervisory board, to issue the Offer Shares and exclude any pre-emptive rights in relation to the issue of the Offer Shares.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Supervisory Board Resolution
</B>
	&#148; an electronic copy of the executed written resolution of the supervisory board of directors of the Issuer,
	dated 6&nbsp;May 2016 evidencing,
<I>
	inter alia
</I>
	, its approval of the Management Board Resolution.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	the Netherlands
</B>
	&#148; means the part
	of the Kingdom of the Netherlands located in Europe.
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; HEIGHT:0PT; FONT-SIZE:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</EFX_EXHIBIT_5>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Subject: Merus BV: Dutch tax opinion prospectus
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Ladies and Gentlemen,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We have acted as Dutch tax counsel to
	Merus B.V., a company with limited liability incorporated under the laws of the Netherland which will be transformed into a N.V., a public company with limited liability under the laws of the Netherlands (the &#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;), in
	connection with the initial public offering on the date hereof of the Company&#146;s common shares (the &#147;Securities&#148;) pursuant to the Registration Statement on Form F-1 (the &#147;Registration Statement&#148;) of which this exhibit is a
	part. You have requested us to issue a tax opinion (
<B>
	the &#147;Opinion
</B>
	&#148;) on the Dutch tax aspects of the Company&#146;s Registration Statement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	General
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We have based our Opinion on the Registration Statement, including the Prospectus included
	therein, and such other documentation you have provided us with (the &#147;
<B>
	Documents
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We express no opinion as to the legal validity and
	binding nature of the Documents under Netherlands law, nor as to any commercial, accounting, or other non-legal matter other than those specifically addressed in this Opinion. Furthermore, we express no opinion of any law other than the tax laws of
	the Netherlands in force as at the date of this Opinion, as applied and interpreted according to the current published case law of the Netherlands courts and administrative rulings. These laws and regulations may be subject to change or modification
	retroactively and/or prospectively, and any such change could affect the validity or correctness of this Opinion.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We will not update our Opinion in the
	case of changes or modifications to the law and regulations subsequent to the date of this Opinion or to the judicial and administrative interpretations thereof, unless you separately engage us to do so in writing after such subsequent change or
	modification.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We have not investigated or verified the accuracy of any of the facts, representations or warranties set out in
	the Documents or orally presented to us. To the extent that the accuracy of such facts, representations and warranties not so investigated or verified and of any facts stated in the Documents or orally presented is relevant to the contents of this
	Opinion, we have assumed that such facts, representations and warranties are correct.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Opinion
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Subject to and based on the foregoing, we hereby confirm that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	-
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The statements in the Registration Statement of the Company under the heading &#147;MATERIAL TAX
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	CONSIDERATIONS&nbsp;-&nbsp;Material
</FONT>
	Dutch Tax Considerations&#148; constitute an
	accurate summary thereof in all material respects;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	-
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company is subject to income taxes in the Netherlands;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	-
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company has tax loss carry-forwards of &#128;43.5&nbsp;million and &#128;71.3&nbsp;million as of December&nbsp;31, 2014 and 2015, respectively;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	-
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	As a result of Dutch income tax law, tax loss carry-forwards are subject to a time limitation of nine years;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	-
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company is correct in assuming that public trading as such of common shares of the Company should not negatively affect the tax loss carry-forward position of the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	-
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company has an agreement with the Dutch tax authorities regarding the application of the Innovation Box for the years 2011 to 2015 which results in an estimated effective tax rate of 10%;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	-
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The agreement on the Innovation Box has been extended through the year 2019.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Conditions and reservations
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Opinion is strictly limited to the matters discussed herein and is not
	to be read as extending by implication to any matters not specifically referred to herein. This Opinion is addressed to you and is solely for your benefit. This Opinion may not be relied upon by or disclosed to any other person, company, enterprise
	or institution, without our prior written consent. This Opinion may, however, be disclosed as an exhibit to the Registration Statement. This opinion letter is not to be used or relied upon for any purpose other than in connection with the filing of
	the Registration Statement. Accordingly, we relieve you from the obligation set forth in article 7.3 of our General Terms and Conditions.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Yours
	sincerely,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	MEIJBURG&nbsp;&amp; CO
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	By:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
