<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<I>
	Subject
</I>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
	Interest option for the next period
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1PT">
<TD HEIGHT="16">
</TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Dear Mrs.&nbsp;Margretson and Mr.&nbsp;Logtenberg,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Some time ago we have informed you about the lapse of the fixed interest rate period as per 31&nbsp;March 2016 for your loan with number 3083.967.039. I kindly
	request you to make a choice for an interest type and interest rate which shall apply as of 1&nbsp;April 2016 (effective date).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Interest proposal
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	I propose the following interest types and interest rates:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2.00EM; TEXT-INDENT:-1.50EM; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#149;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A fixed interest rate for 1 year as of the effective date: 3.55&nbsp;% per year. You
	will pay the interest in monthly arrears after each month.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:1.90EM; TEXT-INDENT:-1.70EM; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">
	&#161;
</FONT>
</SUP>
</FONT>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A fixed interest rate for 3 years as of the effective date: 3.60%&nbsp;per year. You will pay the interest in monthly arrears after each month.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:1.90EM; TEXT-INDENT:-1.70EM; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">
	&#161;
</FONT>
</SUP>
</FONT>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A fixed interest rate for 4 years as of the effective date: 3.75%&nbsp;per year. You will pay the interest in monthly arrears
	after each month.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:1.90EM; TEXT-INDENT:-1.70EM; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL">
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">
	&#161;
</FONT>
</SUP>
</FONT>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Rabobank Variable Plus Loan. The interest rate is now 4.35%&nbsp;per year. You will pay the
	interest in monthly arrears after each month. The bank may amend the interest rate at any time. The terms of this interest type are also stated in the (general) terms and conditions which are applicable to the loan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	I kindly request you to tick the desired interest type and interest rate and to return
	this letter duly signed. If I receive this letter by 24&nbsp;March 2016, your choice shall be effective as of the effective date.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Please note:
</B>
	if the above is not met within the proposed time, then from the effective date up to 31&nbsp;March 2020, the fixed interest rate as offered
	in this letter for a period of 4 years shall apply to your loan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In so far as this
	letter does not deviate from the (general) terms and conditions which apply to the loan, the (general) terms and conditions remain applicable.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If you have any questions, please do contact me.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Best regards,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Bedrijven MKB
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:1PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	for Pieter van Hulsen
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<A NAME="eolPage396"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	LEASE AGREEMENT FOR OFFICE SPACE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AND LABORATORY SPACE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	CONSIDERING THAT:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The LSI on Yalelaan is primarily intended to house life sciences companies (objective);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Given the above objective, several companies can be housed on each floor;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	These companies should share the facilities such as toilets and galleys, present on their floor;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	That office and laboratory spaces in the LSI are offered based on market conditions, taking into account the issued ERDF grant;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In some cases, specific and individual agreements are made with stage life science companies, including those concerning the lease amount, possible discount,
	lease period and notice period.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	THE UNDERSIGNED
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Stichting Incubator Utrecht
</B>
	, incorporated and domiciled in 3584 CM Utrecht at Yalelaan 40, hereby legally represented by its director Oscar Schoots
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	hereinafter referred to as the &#145;Lessor&#146;,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	AND
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Merus B.V
</B>
	., its registered office in 6534 AB Nijmegen and offices at 3584 CH Utrecht at the Padualaan 8; and hereby legally represents by Mr Ton
	Logtenberg and Mrs.&nbsp;Shelley&nbsp;J. Margetson jointly.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	hereinafter referred to as &#145;Lessee&#146;,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	registered with the trade register in Amsterdam under CoC No.&nbsp;30189136, VAT number XXXXXXXXX.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	AGREED
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	The Leased Premises, designation
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Lessor lets to Lessee and Lessee leases from Lessor, specific areas in the new business complex known as LSI (situated at 62 Yalelaan 62, 3584 CM, Utrecht), spaces on the second (2
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	nd
</SUP>
	)&nbsp;floor numbered 3.14 through 3.28 and 4.06 through 4.16 (office) and 3.01 through 3.13 and 4.02 through 4.05 (laboratory), hereinafter referred to as &#145;the Leased Premises&#146;, situated
	at Yalelaan in Utrecht, including the shared use of common areas such as the entrance, goods entrance and atrium (ground floor LSI), elevators, on the own floor, the hallway, pantry en toilets, the service building behind the LSI and the bicycle
	storage (basement of the Alexander Numan building) at the Yalelaan 40-60 in Utrecht and further indicated on the drawing attached to this agreement and signed by parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Leased Premises will only be used by or on behalf of the lessee as a laboratory space with associated office space.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage397"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The lessee shall not be allowed to designate the Leased Premises for any purpose other than described in 1.2, without prior written approval by the lessor.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The highest allowed load of the floors of the Leased Premises amounts to 500kg/m&sup2;.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Conditions
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The &#147;GENERAL CONDITIONS OF THE LEASE AGREEMENT FOR OFFICE AND LABORATORY SPACE&#148;, hereinafter referred to as &#145;general conditions&#146;, form part of this agreement. The content of these general conditions
	is known to the parties. The Lessee and Lessor have received a copy of the general conditions, as annex to this agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The general conditions referred to in 2.1, are fully applicable except insofar as expressly waived in this Agreement and any annexes thereto, in which case this agreement and any annexes shall prevail, or if application
	of the general conditions is impossible with regard to the Leased Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Duration, commencement, extension and termination
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	This agreement is concluded for a period of five (5)&nbsp;years. This agreement can be cancelled 12 months before the expiry of the lease period. If the agreement is extended in accordance with 3.3, notice should then
	be given within 6 months prior to the expiration of the lease period.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The final commencement of the lease will be determined further by mutual agreement, but is expected to fall in the period of October - November 2016 and is subject to the final availability of the Leased Premises and
	the actual commissioning by the Lessee. The parties hereby declare to strive for the earliest possible commencement of the lease and will do everything in its power to achieve this, if possible, even before October 2016. In case of force majeure -
	such as, but not limited to delayed delivery of the Leased Premises - the parties will consult to agree on another date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	After the expiry of the termination date established in 3.1, if no notice of termination has taken place, the agreement will automatically be extended for a further period of two (2)&nbsp;years. In the event of
	termination, the Lessee agrees that the Leased Premises will be vacated and clean, free of use and user rights, at the appropriate date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Early termination of this Agreement is only possible by mutual consent. In the event that the Lessee and Lessor terminate the agreement prematurely with mutual consent, the Lessee shall reimburse the Lessor the
	remainder of the Lease Amount Adjustment Share (as mentioned in 4.1 and 4.6) till the end of the term of this Agreement, the details of such remuneration shall then be determined and recorded by mutual agreement. A lump sum payment of the remainder
	of the Lease Amount Adjustment Share shall be deemed sufficient as compensation.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.5
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	In the event of a takeover of the majority of the Lessors shares by a third party &#145;at arm&#146;s length&#146; conditions, the Lessee is entitled to terminate the agreement prematurely once during the period of 3
	(three) months after the aforementioned share transfer, taking into account a notice of 12 months.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.6
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Cancellation or premature termination should take place served as a writ or via registered letter.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage398"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Lease amount, vat, lease price adjustment, payment obligation, payment period
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.1
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The basic lease amount of the Leased Premises on annual base is &#128; 401,698.40 plus Lease Amount Adjustment Share. In addition to the above basic lease amount, the Lessor shall receive additional discounts on the
	basic lease amount, decreasing annually as stated in the table below. Insofar as the lease in the first quarter, or by notice in the last quarter, does not cover a full quarter, the amount due for the first or last quarter will be adjusted pro rata.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Parties agree that the Lessor shall charge VAT on the lease amount. If no VAT taxed lease is agreed to, the lessee shall, apart from the lease amount, pay an individual compensation to lessor to compensate for the
	disadvantage caused or that may be caused because lessor or his successor(s), is (are) no longer able to deduct the VAT from the investments and exploitation expenses of the lessor. That which is stated in 19.1 through 19.9 of the general conditions
	is then not applicable.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If parties have agreed to a VAT taxed lease, lessee and lessor shall use the opportunity, pursuant to Memorandum 45, decree of 24&nbsp;March 1999, no. VB 99/571, to refrain from submitting a collective option request
	for a VAT taxed lease. The lessee declares by signing the lease agreement, also for the benefit of the successor(s) of the lessor, that he shall use or cause the Leased Premises to be used permanently for purposes for which a complete or almost
	complete right to deduct VAT based on article 15 of the Act on VAT 1968, exists.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.4
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The lease amount is modified annually on 1&nbsp;July for the first time commencing on 1&nbsp;July 2017, according to 9.1. through 9.4 of the general conditions.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.5
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The fee that is payable by the lessee for additional supplies and services provided by or on behalf of the Lessor, is determined according to 16 general conditions. A system of advance payments with follow-up sett-off
	applies to this fee, as is indicated.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.6
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The lessee&#146;s payment obligation consists of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	a.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the lease amount;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The VAT due on the lease amount if the parties have agreed to a VAT taxed lease;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	c.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the advance payment on the compensation for the additional supplies and services to be provided by or on behalf of lessor with the VAT due on that; d. a compensation called the estimated &#147;Lease Amount Adjustment
	Share&#146; for adaptations of the Leased Premises requested by the Lessee and carried out by the Lessor, for the Lessee. This Lease Amount Adjustment Share for the investment and financing costs shall be calculated over a period of five years.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	To avoid any misunderstandings, the Lease Amount Adjustment Share under 4.6D, upon the signing of this agreement, exists of
	an
<U>
	estimate
</U>
	. Based on the adaptation needs and cost estimates already made in consultation with the Lessee, and based on an agreed division of costs between the Lessee and Lessor, the final cost per
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage399"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	lessee shall be known definitively after multiple private tenders and the selection thereof. In that case, an amendment to the final calculation of the Lease Amount Adjustment Share shall be
	added to this agreement. The parties hereby acknowledge that the costs may be estimated higher, with a maximum of 20%, or lower than estimated.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.7
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Payment period of 3 (three) calendar month (s), payable quarterly in advance.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.8
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The periodic payments based on this lease agreement payable by the lessee to the lessor as reflected in 4.7 are payable in one amount, in advance, in Euro. The Lessor shall submit the Lessee with an invoice, for each
	period.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.9
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Lessee is always allowed to reimburse the Lessor the remainder of the Lease Amount Adjustment Share (as mentioned in 4.1 and 4.6) till the end of the term of this agreement by means of a lump sum payment. The
	settlement amount exceeds the sum of the remaining quarters, multiplied by the quarterly amount of the Lease Amount Adjustment Share, with a discount of 5%.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.10
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Unless mentioned otherwise, all amounts in this lease agreement and the general conditions forming part thereof exclude VAT.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Supplies and services
</B>

	&nbsp;

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	In case of additional supplies and services to be provided by or on behalf of the Lessor, Parties agree that, in accordance with Article 16 of the general conditions, the advance payment of service fees shall amount to
	20% of the basic lease amount, (without discount) upon commencement of the lease, &#128; 20,084.92&nbsp;per quarter, plus VAT, to be paid in advance together with the payment of the lease amount.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	administration charges of 5% on the above mentioned supplies and services
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage400"></A>

	&#128;100,424.60. The bank guarantee shall be issued to the Lessor prior to the final commencement date of the lease.

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.2
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Lessee may, for data and Telecom services, make use of the existing infrastructure of the Lessor and should make appropriate agreements with the Lessor and Utrecht University, Department of ITS (Information
	Technology Services). The Lessee may optionally also make use of the services provided by the Facility Service Centre (FSC) of Utrecht University, such as the cleaning of the Leased Premises, security (connection to the intrusion detection of the
	Leased Premises and the identification of refrigerator / freezers etc. in an emergency room), waste disposal, concierge services etc. The Lessee shall make these agreement directly with the FSC and also settle the costs directly with the FSC, unless
	otherwise agreed with the Lessor.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

<I>
<U>
	Handing over status
</U>
</I>
</B>

	&nbsp;

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.3
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Leased Premises is handed over all-in-one, with partitions, ceilings, lighting, flooring and solid furniture as shown on the attached drawings agreements (ie the final drawings including the Lessee&#146;s needs).
	Offices equipped with climate control per pattern of 3,60m, for up to three fully occupied workplaces. If the Lessee purchases and installs bio-hazard cabinets or microbiological safety cabinets, they must comply with the NEN-EN 12469 standard or
	its replacement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Lessee shall not make any changes to the finish and permanent furnishing of the spaces without prior
	consultation and without written permission from the Lessor (ie walls, fume hoods, lab island tables, carpeting and blinds). In the event that the Lessee wants to apply adjustments, the parties will consult on this. The Lessor shall not withhold
	consent to adaptation needs unreasonably and, insofar as they are not permitted, explain in writing why this is decided. Upon termination of the lease agreement, the lessee shall handover the Leased Premises in accordance with the agreement
	drawings.
</P>

	&#128; 700, - per parking space per year. The Lessee also has the option to purchase parking spaces from the UU at the applicable rate for access

	to parking spaces in the quadrant of Veterinary Medicine. The total parking spaces may not exceed the municipal parking ratio (0.7 per 100 sqm gross floor area). Parking prices to be increased
	with VAT and price levels to adjust from 2017, in accordance with article 9.1 up to 9.4 of the general conditions.

	can use the parking spaces leased by the Lessee. The possibility also exists, when available, to apply for a visitor space for a visitor, from the Lessor.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.7
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	In addition to Article 11, general conditions, the Lessee - if the Lessee uses, in the operation of its business and / or profession, uses or stores an agent and / or substance, which is known to have properties that
	pose a risk of a serious nature to persons or property - is liable for the consequences.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A particular risk of a serious
	nature shall always include a substance that is explosive, oxidizing, flammable, highly flammable or extremely flammable, toxic or very toxic, contagious or highly contagious, in accordance with the criteria and methods adopted under the
	Environmentally Hazardous Substances Act. The Lessee is liable for all direct and indirect damage suffered by the Lessor and the other tenants in the building due to the realization of the danger.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In addition to article 11 of the general conditions, if there are defects in the Property and Leased Premises upon handover and after handover,
	due to negligence or demonstrable fault by the Lessor, the Lessor shall be liable for incurred demonstrable damage, up to a maximum of the annual basic lease amount.
</P>

	necessary, the Lessee shall inform the Lessor, and optionally provide copies of permits, including appendices, among others on behalf of the Wabo (8.14).

	Occupational Health and Safety Service.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	to act in accordance with such permits, except if an offence and / or failure to act in accordance with the permits is caused by the Lessor or by a third party hired by the Lessor.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</I>

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Lessor guarantees that, as far as the Chemical Substances Act and / or associated decisions / regulations are applicable to the Lessee&#146;s activities taking place in the Leased Premises, he complies with all the
	requirements of this act and decisions / regulations, and that he has complied and will continue to comply with all regulations and obligations resulting from this law and the decisions / regulations.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	Minister of Housing, Spatial Planning and the Environment and, insofar as required, the Lessee also has a permit under the Chemical Substances Act.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</U>

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	on Animals Act and / or associated decisions / regulations are applicable to the Lessee&#146;s activities taking place in the Leased Premises, he complies with all the requirements of this law and decisions / regulations, and that he has complied
	and will continue to comply with all regulations and obligations resulting from this law and the decisions / regulations.

	the Lessee carries out animal testing in the sense of the Experiments on Animals Act, he has obtained a relevant permit from the Minister of Health, Welfare and Sport.

<I>
<U>
	Environmental Permitting (General Provisions) Act (Wabo)
</U>
</I>

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	8.14
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	As part of the Environmental Permitting (General Provisions) Act (Wabo), the Environmental Permit with reference HZ_WABO-14-20927, has been granted on 15&nbsp;September 2015 for the Alexander Numan building at Yalelaan
	40-60 and LSI at Yalelaan 62. The Lessor guarantees that, as far as the Wabo and / or associated decisions / regulations are applicable to the Lessee&#146;s activities taking place in the Leased Premises, he complies with all the requirements of
	this law and decisions / regulations, and that he has complied and will continue to comply with all regulations and obligations resulting from this law and the decisions / regulations.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	requirements of this law and decisions / regulations, and that he has complied and will continue to comply with all regulations and obligations resulting from this law and the decisions / regulations.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If the Lessee prepares, transports, stores, applies, imports or exports radioactive material to and from Dutch territory, or commissions such,
	or discards radioactive material, the Lessee will have received a permit and the Lessee is obligated to keep records in that respect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<I>
<U>
	Access to
	the Leased Premises
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.16
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Lessor and all persons designated by him are always allowed to access the Leased Premises, without any prior consent from the Lessee, with the necessary equipment and to inspect, both inside and outside, provided
	that the Lessor is of the opinion that there is a need for this and, where reasonably practicable, subject to the limitations and precautions prescribed in the relevant permits. The Lessor is always entitled to check that the Lessee meets the legal
	requirements and, in that context, the Lessee shall provide, on request from the Lessor, the necessary information to the Lessor. If possible, the Lessor shall first enter into consultation with the Lessee in case access to the Leased Premises is
	planned. The Lessor shall also ensure that the Leased Premises, where appropriate, can only be accessed by legally authorized persons. In case of prior consultation between the Lessee and the Lessor has not been possible, the Lessor will inform the
	Lessee about the access and the reasons and background thereof, afterwards.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<I>
<U>
	Sub-letting
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.17
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Unless the Lessor has approved this prior, the lessee shall not be allowed to let or sublet a part or the entire Leased Premises to external parties, or to transfer the tenancy rights entirely or partially to external
	parties or to include this in a company or legal entity.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<I>
<U>
	Violating the provisions of the lease agreement
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	8.18
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	In the event that the Lessee or Lessor acts in violation of any provision of this lease agreement, and fails to remedy this within a period of 30 (thirty) days, or as much faster as reasonably possible, the other party
	has the right to terminate the lease with immediate effect, without prejudice to the parties&#146; right to performance or termination, as well as to claim damages.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage404"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In addition to article 6.7 of the general conditions, the Lessor is entitled to terminate the
	lease agreement with immediate effect without prior notice, if the required permits and / or exemptions which the Lessee needs in the execution of its activities at the Leased Premises, have expired, have been refused or have been withdrawn.
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_63"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<I>
<U>
	Jurisdiction
</U>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	8.19
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Dutch law applies to this lease agreement.
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage405"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

<B>
	Consent of Supervisory Board Nominee
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Pursuant to Rule 438 promulgated under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, I hereby consent to be named in the Registration Statement on
	Form F-1 (the &#147;
<B>
<I>
	Registration Statement
</I>
</B>
	&#148;)
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
	of Merus B.V., and any amendments or supplements thereto, including the prospectus contained therein, as an individual to become a member of the supervisory board of Merus
	B.V., to all references to me in connection therewith and to the filing or attachment of this consent as an exhibit to such Registration Statement and any amendment or supplement thereto.
</P>
